name: The Imprisoned Bots
description:
The very evil Sir Evil the Third has imprisoned all your friends and their fate is up to you! Will you be able to save them and topple Sir Evil the Third's reign?

In The Imprisoned Bots you play a robot who has to get their friends out of their cells. Perhaps the keys that were left by some dense followers of Sir Evil the Third can help you in your quest?

The Imprisoned Bots is a 2D puzzle, platformer game features 15 levels including an epic final challenge! It was created for the Mini Jam 96: Fate with the limitation of "losing is good" and the two core mechanics are therefore having the fate of saving the player's friends and being able to remove cogs in order to remove obstacles. 

Controls:

WASD: Move Player 1

Arrow Keys: Move Player 2

Space/Arrow Up: Jump

E: Interact

R: Restart Level (in case you screwed up an important puzzle order or challenge)

Left Mouse: Skip dialogue
